::Slayer::

Slayer looks up, distracted from Zoe's comment by a shadow passing
over near him. He sees Megaton, confirming that the bot's signature
wasn't Maximal and not worrying about him.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megaton flew up high in the sky to see if he could spot the
attacker, he had
> to be carefull that he didn't hit any Maximals during the ceasefire,
he had
> to be sure to get his target right.
